title: Left Right Output - Adam Tension Project
content:
Hello Typophile,

I stumbled onto this forum today, many sharp minds and eyes here it seems...  
I released some work recently, working under the name Adam Tension. Sort of an exhibit, with a variety of work for a variety of reasons.

[http://www.leftrightoutput.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013233404/http:/www.leftrightoutput.com/ "http://www.leftrightoutput.com")

I'd really appreciate some feedback, though this area of the forum doesn't seem to be too busy. It's very heavy with typography, I figure some opinions can be found here.

Cheers,  
Clint
author: calvinhob
